title: Rotate the screen after entering text during the search, and the text disappears
body:
**Describe the bug**
I found an issue during the search process. After entering the text, I rotated the device and the text I just entered disappeared.

**To Reproduce**
Steps to reproduce the behavior:
1. Click on 'Search' button
2. Enter text and rotate the phone
3. See error

**Expected behavior**
The pages before and after rotation should remain consistent, which means that the entered text should still be on the page.

**Screenshots**
[Amaze-ro.webm](https://github.com/TeamAmaze/AmazeFileManager/assets/46777154/14501be6-591d-4144-9b82-95d569898835)


**Smartphone (please complete the following information):**
Device: [e.g. Nexus 5X]
OS: [e.g. Android 8]
Rooted: [e.g. No]
Version: [e.g. 3.10]

**Additional context**
Add any other context about the problem here.
